013package org.apache.juneau.examples.rest;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.*;
017import org.apache.juneau.rest.annotation.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.rest.beans.*;
019import org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.rest.widget.*;
021
022/**
023 * Sample resource that allows images to be uploaded and retrieved.
024 *
025 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jrs.Marshalling">REST Marshalling</a>
027 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jrs.UtilityBeans">Utility Beans</a>
028 * </ul>
029 */
030@Rest(
031   path="/utilitybeans",
032   title="Utility beans examples",
033   description="Examples of utility bean usage."
034)
035@HtmlDocConfig(
036   widgets={
037      ContentTypeMenuItem.class
038   },
039   navlinks={
040      "up: request:/..",
041      "api: servlet:/api",
042      "stats: servlet:/stats",
043      "$W{ContentTypeMenuItem}",
044      "source: $C{Source/gitHub}/org/apache/juneau/examples/rest/UtilityBeansResource.java"
045   },
046   aside={
047      "<div class='text'>",
048      "  <p>Examples of serialized beans in the org.apache.juneau.rest.utilitybeans package.</p>",
049      "</div>"
050   },
051   asideFloat="RIGHT"
052)
053public class UtilityBeansResource extends BasicRestObject {
054
055   @SuppressWarnings("unused")
056   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
057
058   /**
059    * [HTTP GET /utilitybeans]
060    * @return Descriptive links to the child endpoints.
061    */
062   @RestGet("/")
063   public ResourceDescriptions getChildDescriptions() {
064      return ResourceDescriptions
065         .create()
066         .append("BeanDescription", "Example of BeanDescription bean")
067         .append("Hyperlink", "Example of Hyperlink bean")
068         .append("SeeOtherRoot", "Example of SeeOtherRoot bean");
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * [HTTP GET /utilitybeans/BeanDescription]
073    * @return Example of serialized org.apache.juneau.rest.utilitybeans.ResourceDescriptions bean.
074    */
075   @RestGet("/BeanDescription")
076   @HtmlDocConfig(
077      aside={
078         "<div class='text'>",
079         "  <p>Example of serialized ResourceDescriptions bean.</p>",
080         "</div>"
081      }
082   )
083   public BeanDescription aBeanDescription() {
084      return BeanDescription.of(Address.class);
085   }
086
087   /**
088    * Sample address bean used for demonstrating utility bean functionality.
089    */
090   @Bean(p="street,city,state,zip,isCurrent")
091   public static class Address {
092
093      /** Street address. */
094      public String street;
095
096      /** City name. */
097      public String city;
098
099      /** State abbreviation. */
100      public String state;
101
102      /** ZIP code. */
103      public int zip;
104
105      /** Whether this is the current address. */
106      public boolean isCurrent;
107
108      /** Default constructor. */
109      public Address() {}
110   }
111
112   /**
113    * [HTTP GET /utilitybeans/Hyperlink]
114    * @return Example of serialized org.apache.juneau.rest.utilitybeans.Hyperlink bean.
115    */
116   @RestGet("/Hyperlink")
117   @HtmlDocConfig(
118      aside={
119         "<div class='text'>",
120         "  <p>Example of serialized Hyperlink bean.</p>",
121         "</div>"
122      }
123   )
124   public Hyperlink aHyperlink() {
125      return Hyperlink.create("/utilitybeans", "Back to /utilitybeans");
126   }
127
128   /**
129    * [HTTP GET /utilitybeans/SeeOtherRoot]
130    * @return Example of serialized SeeOtherRoot bean.
131    * This just redirects back to the servlet root.
132    */
133   @RestGet("/SeeOtherRoot")
134   @HtmlDocConfig(
135      aside={
136         "<div class='text'>",
137         "  <p>Example of serialized org.apache.juneau.rest.utilitybeans.SeeOtherRoot bean.</p>",
138         "</div>"
139      }
140   )
141   public SeeOtherRoot aSeeOtherRoot() {
142      return SeeOtherRoot.INSTANCE;
143   }
144}
